parameters.name: options.behavior
parameters.description: Defines the scrolling transition animation. Default 'auto'.

parameters.name: options.enabled
parameters.description: Initial state of the auto-scroll functionality. Default: 'true'.

parameters.name: options.threshold
parameters.description: Distance in pixels from the bottom to consider the user at the end. Default 100.

returnValues.name: autoScrollEnabled
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if auto-scrolling is currently active.

returnValues.name: disableAutoScroll
returnValues.description: Function to manually turn off the auto-scrolling logic.

returnValues.name: enableAutoScroll
returnValues.description: Function to manually turn on auto-scrolling and immediately scroll to the bottom.

returnValues.name: isAtBottom
returnValues.description: Reactive state indicating if the container is currently scrolled to the end.

returnValues.name: ref
returnValues.description: The ref that must be attached to the scrollable container element.

returnValues.name: scrollToBottom
returnValues.description: Imperative function to scroll the container to the bottom.
